overview: Cunegonde reads a piece about spiritism in the newspaper and wants try it. This is seen by the street kids who decide to help Cunegonde a hand. Cunegonde goes to Professor Geestkijker to learn the tricks and in the meantime the children slip into her house, where they hide everywhere. They give Cunegonde such a fright that she quickly provides the spirits with sweets.
title: Cunégonde fait du spiritisme
